name: Lazer Rush
description: Lazer Rush is a thrilling FPS Platformer that combines chaotic shoot-outs with intense platforming. Fight evil robots with melee and shooting combat as well with special weapon powers. Double Jump and hang on to ladders and ledges across platforming challenges that utilize verticality. Combine them both for a cinematic but, untethered rollercoaster of a game. Jump in and feel the Lazer Rush.
